plot: A journalist from the US comes to Spain to visit his ex-girlfriend that has become a famous actress. They renew their romance but her work interposes between them.
title: Sharon vestida de rojo
plot_es: A journalist from the US comes to Spain to visit his ex-girlfriend that has become a famous actress. They renew their romance but her work interposes between them.
plot_en: A journalist from the US comes to Spain to visit his ex-girlfriend that has become a famous actress. They renew their romance but her work interposes between them.
